statements: DELETE FROM events WHERE event_id = 100 AND venue_id = 10;
DELETE FROM events WHERE venue_capacity < attendance OR event_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM attendance_records WHERE event_id = 12345 AND attendee_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM event_venue WHERE venue_id = 3 AND event_id = 5;
DELETE FROM event_attendance WHERE event_id = 1 AND attendee_id = 101;
DELETE FROM venue_capacity WHERE venue_id IN (SELECT venue_id FROM event_venue WHERE event_date < '2021-01-01');
DELETE FROM Events WHERE event_id = 1 AND attendance_count < 1000;
DELETE FROM Event_Attendees WHERE event_id IN (SELECT event_id FROM Events WHERE event_date < '2023-01-01');
